Description: A global tech leader in search, cloud computing, AI, and web technologies.
Creator of Windows, Azure, and .NET — a pioneer in enterprise and cloud solutions.
Builds social platforms and invests heavily in React, VR, and the metaverse.
Designs iOS, macOS, and hardware like iPhone and Mac — a leader in mobile ecosystems.
Runs AWS, the world’s largest cloud platform, and revolutionized online shopping.
A historic innovator in data science, AI (Watson), and enterprise technology.
The company behind Unity — the most popular engine for 2D and 3D game development.
A leading cybersecurity company specializing in endpoint protection and threat intelligence.
Builds powerful data platforms for defense, healthcare, and finance industries.
The collaborative design tool used by teams worldwide to build user interfaces.
A tech-driven entertainment company known for its scalable backend and microservices.
The home for open-source projects and developer collaboration, owned by Microsoft.
